meanings.sent1: The alarm clock beeped loudly in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The microwave beeped when the food was ready.
meanings.sent3: The robot beeped happily after completing its task.
meanings.sent4: The car horn beeped urgently to warn the pedestrians.
meanings.sent5: The computer beeped repeatedly to indicate an error.

meanings.sent1: The truck beeped as it backed up in the parking lot.
meanings.sent2: The watch beeped every hour to remind him of the time.
meanings.sent3: The toy robot beeped playfully as it moved around.
meanings.sent4: The phone beeped softly with each new message received.
meanings.sent5: The machine beeped rhythmically during the test.
